# LinkCrate

**LinkCrate** is a modern link-sharing web app that allows users to create a customizable profile with social links, personal information, a profile image, and a shareable link with an auto-generated QR code. Built using React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase.

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ” User authentication (Sign up / Log in)
- ğŸ“ Add and manage social/media links (LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, etc.)
- ğŸ–¼ï¸ Upload a profile image
- ğŸ“ Edit profile details (first name, last name, email)
- ğŸ”— Unique shareable public profile URL
- ğŸ“± Automatically generated QR code for easy sharing
- âš¡ Fast, responsive, and mobile-friendly UI

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

- **Frontend:** React, TypeScript, Vite
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **Backend & Auth:** Supabase
